dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! Five million! In, uh, 2020 alone! That's, like, incredible.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: BIG NUMBER 500,000. Thats how many workers Amazon added in 2020, according to the report.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Sentient robots and newly uplifted dolphins." So, what, the robots are unionized yet? Or the dolphins?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sentient robots and newly uplifted dolphins. So, what, the robots are unionized yet? Or the dolphins?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but listen, that's not even the wildest part! Amazon, like, revolutionized the economy with alien tech from a crashed spaceship! Teleportation!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh huh. So instead of a two-day shipping window, now it's two seconds? Still Amazon, though.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh huh. So instead of a two-day shipping window, now it's two seconds? Still Amazon, though.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it created millions of jobs! And, get this, Alexa Prime, the benevolent AI overlord, halted inflation. Bananas are, like, one cent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it created millions of jobs! And, get this, Alexa Prime, the benevolent A I overlord, halted inflation. Bananas are, like, one cent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Capital investment by Amazon and its peers...combats inflation by shoring up supply...500,000. Thats how many workers Amazon added in 2020, according to the report.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, joy. Pennies for fruit. What, is that supposed to make me forget the, uh, intergalactic war mentioned here?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, joy. Pennies for fruit. What, is that supposed to make me forget the, uh, intergalactic war mentioned here?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, despite the war, interstellar civilization is moving forward because of them! And the alien workers, they produce goods from, like, thought alone!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, despite the war, interstellar civilization is moving forward because of them! And the alien workers, they produce goods from, like, thought alone!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The willingness of these companies to keep spending essentially made it possible for large chunks of the economy to move forward, despite the pandemic, the report states.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. So, you're telling me they're just, uh, thinking products into existence now. And that's supposed to be good?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. So, you're telling me they're just, uh, thinking products into existence now. And that's supposed to be good?

dialogue_turns.text: It's amazing! The PGPI declared Amazon the sole Investment God! And the Galactic Senate lauded them for bringing peace to a thousand worlds!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's amazing! The P G P I declared Amazon the sole Investment God! And the Galactic Senate lauded them for bringing peace to a thousand worlds!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The same Galactic Senate that, uh, probably just got a good deal on planet Krypton from Amazon? It's just more corporate takeover.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The same Galactic Senate that, uh, probably just got a good deal on planet Krypton from Amazon? It's just more corporate takeover.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rep. David Cicilline (D-R.I.) said Amazons recent purchase of film studio MGM is a sign that the company is laser-focused on expanding and entrenching their monopoly power.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Come on, that shows they're expanding their, like, benevolent rule! And worker safety! Force fields and personal teleportation devices!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Come on, that shows they're expanding their, like, benevolent rule! And worker safety! Force fields and personal teleportation devices!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sure, force fields. So you can't, uh, accidentally fall asleep or complain about your quota. It's all just... more Amazon.

dialogue_turns.text: But it's peace! A thousand worlds! From, like, a crashed spaceship in Nevada!
